name: Sea Sons
description:
You are the proud mother or father of many fish sons. However! The Bad Flames have imprisoned your boys in barrels inside an abstract maze. Bust them free and be the best parent you can be.

Made for MiniJam 4 

Minijam 4 Requirements(which I think I broke liberally, oh well):

  •      All tiles must be using an 8x8 grid 
  •      You can only use 4 colors, for the whole game
  •      The frame resolution must be 160x144 pixels
  •      You can have up to 2 layers, background and sprite
  •      Each sprite can have 3 colors and a transparent color
  •      You can only have 8 button inputs (including movement(take a look at the game boy to see what i mean))

Themes:

  •     PRIMARY: SEASONS
  •     SECONDARY: FLAMES

Controls

W - Forward

S - Backward

A - Turn Left

D - Turn Right

Q - Strafe Left

E - Strafe Right

Spacebar - Shoot water blobs.
